endpoints.heading: Available endpoints
endpoints.list_html:
• Crops
  • GET /api/v1/masters/crops - List crops
  • POST /api/v1/masters/crops - Create crop
  • GET /api/v1/masters/crops/:id - Show crop
  • PATCH /api/v1/masters/crops/:id - Update crop
  • DELETE /api/v1/masters/crops/:id - Delete crop
  • Fertilizers
  • GET /api/v1/masters/fertilizes - List fertilizers
  • POST /api/v1/masters/fertilizes - Create fertilizer
  • GET /api/v1/masters/fertilizes/:id - Show fertilizer
  • PATCH /api/v1/masters/fertilizes/:id - Update fertilizer
  • DELETE /api/v1/masters/fertilizes/:id - Delete fertilizer
  • Pests
  • GET /api/v1/masters/pests - List pests
  • POST /api/v1/masters/pests - Create pest
  • GET /api/v1/masters/pests/:id - Show pest
  • PATCH /api/v1/masters/pests/:id - Update pest
  • DELETE /api/v1/masters/pests/:id - Delete pest
  • Pesticides
  • GET /api/v1/masters/pesticides - List pesticides
  • POST /api/v1/masters/pesticides - Create pesticide
  • GET /api/v1/masters/pesticides/:id - Show pesticide
  • PATCH /api/v1/masters/pesticides/:id - Update pesticide
  • DELETE /api/v1/masters/pesticides/:id - Delete pesticide
  • Farms
  • GET /api/v1/masters/farms - List farms
  • POST /api/v1/masters/farms - Create farm
  • GET /api/v1/masters/farms/:id - Show farm
  • PATCH /api/v1/masters/farms/:id - Update farm
  • DELETE /api/v1/masters/farms/:id - Delete farm
  • Fields
  • GET /api/v1/masters/farms/:farm_id/fields - List fields
  • POST /api/v1/masters/farms/:farm_id/fields - Create field
  • GET /api/v1/masters/fields/:id - Show field
  • PATCH /api/v1/masters/fields/:id - Update field
  • DELETE /api/v1/masters/fields/:id - Delete field
  • Agricultural Tasks
  • GET /api/v1/masters/agricultural_tasks - List tasks
  • POST /api/v1/masters/agricultural_tasks - Create task
  • GET /api/v1/masters/agricultural_tasks/:id - Show task
  • PATCH /api/v1/masters/agricultural_tasks/:id - Update task
  • DELETE /api/v1/masters/agricultural_tasks/:id - Delete task
  • Interaction Rules
  • GET /api/v1/masters/interaction_rules - List interaction rules
  • POST /api/v1/masters/interaction_rules - Create interaction rule
  • GET /api/v1/masters/interaction_rules/:id - Show interaction rule
  • PATCH /api/v1/masters/interaction_rules/:id - Update interaction rule
  • DELETE /api/v1/masters/interaction_rules/:id - Delete interaction rule

index.title: AGRR - Make Agriculture Smarter | Agricultural Planning Support System
index.description: AGRR is an agricultural crop planning support system that leverages weather data and AI. Create free crop plans, from field management to cultivation planning optimization, supporting sustainable agriculture.

hero.title: üå± Make Agriculture Smarter
hero.subtitle_html:
Take your farming to the next level with
optimal crop planning using weather data and AI

weather.title: Weather Data Analysis
weather.description: Analyze over 20 years of historical weather data to suggest optimal planting times.

ai.title: AI Crop Recommendations
ai.description: AI suggests the most suitable crops for regional climate and soil conditions, considering profitability.

optimization.title: Crop Plan Optimization
optimization.description: Optimize farm size and crop combinations for efficient planning.

field_management.title: Field Management
field_management.description: Manage multiple fields on a map. Get a quick overview of each field's status.

growth_prediction.title: Growth Prediction
growth_prediction.description: Predict crop growth stages using Growing Degree Days (GDD).

cloud.title: Cloud Management
cloud.description: Data is securely managed in the cloud. Access from anywhere.

cta.title: Get Started Now
cta.description_html:
Try creating a crop plan without login.
For more advanced features, please register an account.

default.title: AGRR (Agriculture Resource and Rotation planner) - Agricultural Planning Support System
default.description: AGRR is an agricultural crop planning support system that leverages weather data and AI. From field management to crop information management and cultivation planning optimization, we help realize sustainable agriculture.
default.keywords: agriculture,crop planning,field management,weather data,AI,agricultural DX,cultivation planning,crop rotation,farming support
default.og_description: Agricultural crop planning support system powered by weather data and AI

about.title: About AGRR
about.description: AGRR is an agricultural crop planning support system that leverages weather data and AI. Learn about our main features, characteristics, and development concept.
about.heading: About AGRR

what_is.title: What is AGRR
what_is.content: AGRR (Agriculture Resource and Rotation planner) is a web application that assists farmers with crop planning. It supports efficient and sustainable agricultural planning through field management, crop information management, and weather data utilization.

items.title: Crop Plan Optimization
items.description: Automatically generates optimal crop plans considering field conditions, crop characteristics, and crop rotation issues.

items.title: Field Management
items.description: Manage multiple fields on a map and record area, location information, and cultivation history for each field.

items.title: Weather Data Utilization
items.description: Leverages historical weather data and future predictions to suggest optimal planting times suitable for the climate.

items.title: Gantt Chart Display
items.description: Visually displays crop plans, allowing you to grasp the annual cultivation schedule at a glance.

characteristics.title: AGRR Characteristics
characteristics.intro: AGRR supports farmers with the following features:
items: Simple and Easy to Use - Anyone can easily create crop plans with intuitive operations
Data-Driven Recommendations - Proposes optimal plans based on weather data and scientific knowledge
Supports Sustainable Agriculture - Enables long-term cultivation planning considering crop rotation issues
Accessible Anytime, Anywhere - Can be accessed from smartphones and tablets with an internet connection
Free to Start - Basic features are available for free

development.title: Development & Operations
development.paragraph1: AGRR is developed to promote agricultural DX (Digital Transformation) and realize more efficient and sustainable agriculture.
development.paragraph2: Service improvements and new feature additions are ongoing, and we value feedback from all our users.

operator.title: Operator Information
operator.initiative: Initiative: In addition to hands-on experience at a community garden, we reference publicly available agricultural technical materials and papers to organize crop-specific requirements and planning insights.
operator.ads_notice_html: Ads: This site uses Google AdSense and may use cookies for ad delivery. Please see the %{privacy_link} for details.
operator.sources_and_updates: We list key references and public materials at the end of each article and continually update content based on the latest research and field data.

contact_section.title: Contact
contact_section.message: Please feel free to send us your questions, requests, and feedback about the service.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Contact AGRR here. Feel free to reach out with questions about the service, requests, technical support, and more.
contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.intro: Please contact us using the following method regarding AGRR.
contact.email_intro: Please contact us at the following email address:
contact.email_note: * We typically respond within 1-3 business days.
notes: Please include your name (or handle name)
Please describe your inquiry in as much detail as possible
If an error occurred, it would be helpful to include error messages or screenshots
Please confirm your reply email address
contact.faq_intro: Before contacting us, please check the following FAQ:
faq_items: Cannot log in ‚Üí Please check your Google authentication settings
Data not saving ‚Üí Please check if browser cookies are enabled
Weather data not displaying ‚Üí Please check if field location information is set correctly
contact.footer_message: We look forward to your feedback and requests for service improvement.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: AGRR's privacy policy. Details on how we collect, use, and manage personal information.
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_html: AGRR (hereinafter "the Service") respects user privacy and is committed to protecting personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how the Service collects, uses, and protects information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: The Service may collect the following information:
items: Information obtained through Google OAuth authentication (email address, name, profile picture)
Field information, crop information, and cultivation plan data entered by users
Access logs, IP addresses, browser information
Information collected through cookies and similar technologies

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Use
section2.intro: Collected information is used for the following purposes:
items: Providing, operating, and improving the Service
Providing user support
Maintaining security
Creating and analyzing statistical data
Responding to legal requirements

section3.title: 3. Third-Party Disclosure
section3.intro: The Service will not provide users' personal information to third parties, except in the following cases:
items: When user consent has been obtained
When required by law
When necessary to protect life, body, or property

section4.title: 4. Use of Google Analytics
section4.content_html: The Service uses Google Analytics to understand site usage. Google Analytics collects user information using cookies, but does not include personally identifiable information. For details, please see the Google Privacy Policy.

section5.title: 5. Use of Google AdSense
section5.content_html: The Service uses Google AdSense to deliver advertisements. Google AdSense uses cookies to display ads based on user interests. You can disable personalized ads by disabling cookies. For details, please see Google Ad Settings.

section6.title: 6. Security
section6.content: The Service implements appropriate security measures to protect personal information. However, we cannot guarantee the complete security of data transmission over the Internet.

section7.title: 7. Changes to Privacy Policy
section7.content: The Service may change this Privacy Policy as necessary. The revised Privacy Policy will take effect when posted on this page.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content_html: For inquiries regarding the Privacy Policy, please contact us via %{contact_link}.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: AGRR's terms of service. Details on service usage conditions, prohibited actions, and disclaimers.
terms.heading: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") define the conditions for using AGRR ("the Service"). By using the Service, users are deemed to have agreed to these Terms.

article1.title: Article 1 (Application)
article1.content: These Terms define the conditions for using the Service and apply to all relationships between users and the Service operator.

article2.title: Article 2 (Service Content)
article2.intro: The Service provides the following features:
items: Assistance in creating agricultural crop plans
Field management functions
Crop information management
Weather data display
Cultivation plan optimization

article3.title: Article 3 (Accounts)
article3.content: Users can use the Service through Google authentication. Users are responsible for properly managing their account information.

article4.title: Article 4 (Prohibited Activities)
article4.intro: Users must not engage in the following activities:
items: Activities that violate laws or public order and morals
Activities that interfere with Service operations
Activities that infringe on the rights of other users or third parties
Using the Service through unauthorized access or other improper means
Activities that threaten Service security
Registering false information

article5.title: Article 5 (Intellectual Property Rights)
article5.content: Intellectual property rights related to the Service belong to the Service operator or legitimate rights holders. Intellectual property rights for data posted by users belong to the users, but users grant permission to use such data to the extent necessary for Service operation and improvement.

article6.title: Article 6 (Disclaimer)
article6.intro: The Service assumes no responsibility for the following:
items: Accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of the Service
Damages arising from use of the Service
Accuracy of weather data or crop plans
Disputes between users or between users and third parties
article6.note: The Service provides reference information for agricultural planning and does not guarantee actual cultivation results.

article7.title: Article 7 (Service Changes and Termination)
article7.content: The Service may change or terminate the Service content without prior notice to users. The Service assumes no responsibility for any damages arising from such changes or termination.

article8.title: Article 8 (Changes to Terms)
article8.content: The Service may change these Terms as necessary. Revised Terms will take effect when posted on this page.

article9.title: Article 9 (Governing Law and Jurisdiction)
article9.content: These Terms are governed by Japanese law, and disputes regarding these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the court having jurisdiction over the location of the Service operator.

article10.title: Article 10 (Contact)
article10.content_html: For inquiries regarding these Terms, please contact us via %{contact_link}.
